name: Zombie Defense (itch) (Dzeruo)
description:
I'd like some suggestions if you could to try and make it more fun. New maps, enemies and defenses are already coming, but feel free to tell me what  you'd like. A graphical overhaul is also due to come, but fear not, I pretend to keep the style simple as I feel that's the better way to go for this type of game. 

Unfortunatly there is still no linux/mac port seeing as the game is so early in its development stages.
